name: __ENiagaraMeshFacingMode
doc: This enum decides how a mesh particle will orient its "facing" axis relative to camera. Must keep these in sync with NiagaraMeshVertexFactory.ush

Default: Ignores the camera altogether. The mesh aligns its local-space X-axis with the particles' local-space X-axis, after transforming by the Particles.Transform vector (if it exists).
Velocity: The mesh aligns it's local-space X-axis with the particle's Particles.Velocity vector.
CameraPosition: Has the mesh local-space X-axis point towards the camera's position.
CameraPlane: Has the mesh local-space X-axis point towards the closest point on the camera view plane.
